text: wa'iidha ttla ealaa almushrikin ayat allah alati 'anzalnaha 'iilayk -ayha alrswl- wadhat, qal aladhin la yakhafun alhsab, wala yarjun althwab, wala yuminun biawm albaeth walnshwr: ayt biquran ghayr hdha, 'aw bddil hdha alqran: bi'ana tajeal alhlal hramana, walhram halalana walwed weydana, walwaeid wedana, wa'ana tusqt ma fih min eyb alihatina wtsfyh ahlamna, qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: 'iina dhlk lays 'ilya, wa'iinama 'atabie fi kl ma amrkm bih wanhakm eanh ma ynzlh ely rabiy wyamrny bh, 'iiniy 'akhshaa min allah -'in khalafat amrh- eadhab yawm eazim wahu yawm alqyamt
